name: Downstairs Hallway
longDesc:
You are in the DOWNSTAIRS HALLWAY.
There are doors leading to the FRONT PORCH, DINING ROOM,
FAMILY ROOM, and KITCHEN. The STAIRCASE is at the end of the hallway.
A jumble of your family's possessions fills the space.
description:
You are in the DOWNSTAIRS HALLWAY.
There are doors leading to the FRONT PORCH, DINING ROOM,
FAMILY ROOM, and KITCHEN. The STAIRCASE is at the end of the hallway.

mail.name: mail
mail.description: There is a large pile of mail by the front door at the end of the hallway.
mail.discoveryStatement:
One LETTER stands out in particular, it might just be junk
but take a closer look to be sure

letter.name: letter
letter.description:
Flashy direct mail advertising for securing your top secret lair.
Don't leave it up to fate whether your kids discover your secret inventtions and discoveries.
There's a note in your dad's handwriting:
Maybe we should consider something more secure than just a password stuck to the side of the desk?

shoe tray.name: shoe tray
shoe tray.description: You're supposed to put muddy shoes on the tray, but there aren't any there right now.
shoe tray.discoveryStatement: The only thing on the shoe tray today is an UMBRELLA.

umbrella.name: umbrella
umbrella.description: The umbrella is orange and blue and very large.

skateboard.name: skateboard
skateboard.description: This is your mom's skateboard. She left it in the middle of the hallway AGAIN!
